Method Detail

loadImage

public void loadImage(java.lang.String pFrameName,
                      java.lang.String pFileName)
loads an image and adds to the frames hashmap using a secified key only looks in the images folder automatically appends .png to the filename so it is not needed

Parameters:
pFrameName - the desired key for the frame
pFileName - of the image file
